title: More Cyberpunk and Witcher Coming - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.30.19
description:
Get 10% off AND free shipping when you use promo code GAMES at http://brooklinen.com.

Hurry to http://Upstart.com/KFGAMES to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

Tim and Andy discuss the horrible allegations against Jeremy Soule, CD Projekt Red's future plans, Halo Master Chief Collection, and more.

Time stamps - 
00:01:46 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:03:54 - CDPR will transit into a dual-franchise studio
00:07:10 - Two Women Accuse Skyrim Composer Jeremy Soule Of Sexual Misconduct
00:09:22 - Several high-profile game developers publicly accused of sexual assault
00:13:47 - NBA 2K20’s Loot Box Trailer
00:21:05 - Borderlands 3 Writer Wants To Pen Tales From The Borderlands Season 2
00:23:15 - Status of Drive Club
00:27:04 - Halo: The Master Chief Collection Will Soon Support Over 6 Million Player-Created Maps
00:29:20 - Out today
00:33:31 -  Brooklinen
00:34:38 - Upstart
Reader mail   -
00:37:08 - “What can members of those communities do to be heard over the noise?” - GillyBrums
00:39:23 - “Why would Kojima bring so much attention to this mechanic?” - The Virtual Boy
00:44:14 - “Not to toot my own horn…” - Jacon Meyers
00:46:42 - “On a scale from 1-10 how scary is control?” - Sapphire Diamond Ruby
00:49:50 - Squad Up: Frankfurtter on Twitch
Required Reading - https://bit.ly/2MMJnIS & https://bit.ly/2NHVtTw
00:51:07 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - No Show! Happy Labor Day!
Tuesday - Greg & Andrea
Wednesday - Greg & Whitta
Thursday - Imran & Suriel Vazquez
Friday - Imran & Javy Gwaltney
